headline: Lennox International (NYSE:LII) Announces 13% Increase In Quarterly Dividend To US$1.30
summary: Lennox International (NYSE:LII) recently approved a 13% increase in its quarterly dividend, rising from $1.15 to $1.30 per share, which may have bolstered investor sentiment. Over the last month, the company's stock rose by 2.8%. This performance aligns favorably even as broader market indices, such as the Dow Jones and S&P 500, experienced declines attributed to revived trade tensions. Contributing to Lennox's positive movement could have been stabilizing factors, such as its acquisition...
